properties.value: Men of West Ardougne are citizens who can be found among other civilians and women who live West Ardougne. Their appearance and dialogue reflect the poor living conditions in the city. Some men in West Ardougne can be attacked, while others only have a Talk-to option.

This article is about men in West Ardougne. For other men, see Man (disambiguation).

Men of West Ardougne are citizens who can be found among other civilians and women who live West Ardougne. Their appearance and dialogue reflect the poor living conditions in the city. Some men in West Ardougne can be attacked, while others only have a Talk-to option.

Contents

  • 1 Dialogue
  • 2 Changes
    • 2.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 3 Trivia

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 July –
19 September 2005

The NPCs' examines were changed from "One of RuneScapes'[sic] many citizens." to "One of RuneScape's many citizens."

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]

Loading...

present


Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • There are five different variants of men, but only two of them appear ingame. Two of the unused variants were not graphically updated alongside the others when Plague City was reworked in 2006.
